Package Controller

Class TableController

java.lang.Object
Controller.TableController
public class TableController extends Object
A controller that is responsible for managing tables and queries that are related to the Order and Reservation.
Since:
10 October 2021

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TableController(int noOfTables)
    Constructs the TableController and initializes the tables and reservations from txt files.

  • Constructor Details

    • TableController

      public TableController(int noOfTables)
      Constructs the TableController and initializes the tables and reservations from txt files.
      Parameters:
      noOfTables - Number of tables in this restaurant (12 by default).

  • Method Details

    • addToOrder

      public void addToOrder(int tableId, Item item, int quantity)
      Adds a quantity of Item objects to the order of the table tableId.
      Parameters:
      tableId - The ID of the table that has the order needs to be processed.
      item - The Item object to be added.
      quantity - The number of Item objects to be added.

    • addToOrder

      public void addToOrder(int tableId, Promotion promotion, int quantity)
      Adds a quantity of Promotion objects to the order of the table tableId.
      Parameters:
      tableId - The ID of the table that has the order needs to be processed.
      promotion - The Promotion object to be added.
      quantity - The number of Promotion objects to be added.

    • deleteExpiredReservations

      public void deleteExpiredReservations()
      Deletes all of the resevations that are expired after 1 minute not checking in.

    • findReservation

      public Reservation findReservation(String res_id)
      Finds the reservation by its id.
      Parameters:
      res_id - The id of reservation to be found.
      Returns:
      The corresponding Reservation object of this id, or null if the system cannot find this id.

    • findTableById

      public Table findTableById(int tableId)
      Finds the table by its id.
      Parameters:
      tableId - The id of the table to be searched.
      Returns:
      The corresponding Table object.

    • findValidTable

      public int findValidTable(String[] details) throws ParseException
      Returns a valid table id to walk in dining or make reservation (based on the restaurant's policy):
      • For 1 or 2 pax: Only allocates tables of 2 or 4 seats.
      • For 3 or 4 pax: Only allocates tables of 4 or 6 seats.
      • For 5 or 6 pax: Only allocates tables of 6 or 8 seats.
      • For 7 or 8 pax: Only allocates tables of 8 or 10 seats.
      • For 9 or 10 pax: Only allocates tables of 10 seats.
      Parameters:
      details - A string array (customer id, timestamp, number of pax).
      Returns:
      The tableId of a valid table, -1 if it cannot find any.
      Throws:
      ParseException

    • getNoOfTables

      public int getNoOfTables()
      Returns the number of tables in this restaurant.
      Returns:
      Number of tables in this restaurant.

    • printAvailableTables

      public boolean printAvailableTables()
      Prints all of the unoccupied tables.
      Returns:
      true if there is at least 1 unoccupied table, false otherwise.

    • printAvailableTables

      public void printAvailableTables(int noPax)
      Prints all of the unoccupied tables that has number of seats >= noPax.
      Parameters:
      noPax - The number of pax.

    • printInvoice

      public void printInvoice(int tableId)
      Prints the final invoice of the table tableId when the customer wants to check out.
      Clears the table tableId by setting it to unoccupied and removing the current order.
      Parameters:
      tableId - The ID of the table that has the order needs to be printed

    • printOrder

      public void printOrder(int tableId, boolean withPrice)
      Prints the current status of the order of table tableId.
      Parameters:
      tableId - The ID of the table that has the order needs to be printed.
      withPrice - true to print the order's price when the customer checks out, false otherwise.

    • printReservations

      public void printReservations()
      Prints all of the reservations in this restaurant.

    • printReservations

      public void printReservations(int tableId)
      Prints all of the reservations that are reserved with table tableId.
      Parameters:
      tableId - The id of table to find the resevations.

    • printUnavailableTables

      public boolean printUnavailableTables()
      Prints all of the occupied tables.
      Returns:
      true if there is at least 1 occupied table, false otherwise.

    • removeFromOrder

      public int removeFromOrder(int tableId, Item item, int quantity)
      Removes a quantity of Item objects from the order of the table tableId.
      Parameters:
      tableId - The ID of the table that has the order needs to be processed.
      item - The Item object to be removed.
      quantity - The number of Item objects to be removed.
      Returns:
      2 if a quantity of item is removed from the order,
      or 1 if all the occurrences of this item are removed from the order,
      or 0 if cannot remove because there is no occurrence of this item in the order.

    • removeFromOrder

      public int removeFromOrder(int tableId, Promotion promotion, int quantity)
      Removes a quantity of Promotion objects from the order of the table tableId.
      Parameters:
      tableId - The ID of the table that has the order needs to be processed.
      promotion - The Promotion object to be removed.
      quantity - The number of Promotion objects to be removed.
      Returns:
      2 if a quantity of promotion is removed from the order,
      or 1 if all the occurrences of this promotion are removed from the order,
      or 0 if cannot remove because there is no occurrence of this promotion in the order.

    • removeReservation

      public boolean removeReservation(String res_id)
      Removes a reservation by its id.
      Parameters:
      res_id - The id of the reservation to be removed (e.g. 5-6 -> table 5, id 6).
      Returns:
      true it is removed successfully, false if it cannot find the resevation id.

    • reserveTable

      public String reserveTable(String[] details)
      Returns the ID of the new reservation if it is made successfully.
      Parameters:
      details - A details string array to make new reservation (customer ID, timestamp, number of pax),
      or a string array from the constructor (customer ID, timestamp, number of pax, table ID, reservation ID).
      Returns:
      The ID of reservation if it is allocated successfully,
      or "false 1" if there is no available table to reserve,
      or "false 2" if the time date of this reservation is in the past.

    • updateReservation

      public String updateReservation(String res_id, int noPax)
      Updates a reservation with a new number of pax.
      Parameters:
      res_id - The ID of the reservation to be updated.
      noPax - The new number of pax.
      Returns:
      The new reservation id or "false" if the update cannot be made.

    • updateReservation

      public String updateReservation(String res_id, String dateTime)
      Updates a reservation with a new date time.
      Parameters:
      res_id - The ID of the reservation to be updated.
      dateTime - The new date time to update.
      Returns:
      The new reservation id or "false" if the update cannot be made.

    • updateReservationFile

      public boolean updateReservationFile()
      Updates the reseravtion.txt file when app is closed.
      Returns:
      true if the file was successfully updated, false otherwise.
